set.says: Sometimes I think about that summer school trip at the theme park...
Here we are, guys!
Please, disembark safely and stay nearby your bus!
All the classes of our school took part, so we were mostly strangers...
...Even though we were coming to the same place every day.
We want you to socialize with other schoolmates, so...
We've set up groups of two from different classes. You'll spend the day with your schoolmate!
And that's how I met her.
Today we're going to explore this area together, so...
Get ready to do your best on having fun!
I hope... You're not going to skip my dialogues... Beacause...
They are very VERY important for getting the good ending!
So listen to me carefully, okay?
I've marked our first target on this park map.
Just find the way and guide us to our first mission...
Let's go!
You're my first NPC here so...
...You have to decide where my first mission in this area is!
So... Where are we going to go first?
So my first mission here is an escort mission...
Very well! I'll slay all the monsters on our way!
Let's go!

_: spent most of the time 'fighting' strangers with an air sword and 'looting' trash cans...

set.says: But at the end, we slowly managed to reach the our destination.
Wow! That's the... Ultra Slipstream 3000! The fastest aircraft of this world!

_: started reviewing ANY videogame produced from the 80s to today speaking at the speed of light.

set.says: I managed to hear just few words, but most of them were arcane acronyms... MOBA, SHMUP... And eventually...
Oh, the rollercoaster!
You are pretty smart for an NPC! I thought you was just a dialogue tutorial...
Is being a dialogue tutorial an insult in your NPC world?
I hope not! In any case... Excuse me, mr.NPC!
The party is safe and sound, so thank you!
I'll evaluate your stats and find a place in my party!
But keep giving your best, okay?
So... Why don't we go for a ride, NPC?
Do you want to jump on my cart?
Very good! You're the strong an mysterious NPC, huh!
Very well! I'll do my best and...
...Get the drop you'll leave behind. Let's go!
Very well! We're going to go on the front one...
And we will conquer the ENTIRE GALAXY with our unlimited firepower!
Let's go!
So you are just for the escort mission NPC, huh?
Very well, I'll do my best on the front line alone!
AND! And I'll get more XP than you, you betcha! Come on, let's go!
Okay! But... Just for this time!
You have to level up faster... And you'll gain more XP alone!
I'll teach you the basis... Let's go!
We jumped on the rollercoaster... And then, my world ended.
I spent most of the time screaming and crying, while that bullet on tracks furiously ran mostly upside down.
But even the apocalypse comes to an end...
Wow! We MUST do that again, right?
Ugh...
Are you... Okay?
Do... Do you need some help?
You are a true beserker, huh?
Very well! That's the unit I need in my army!
Just... Try not to die too soon, okay?
D...Die?!
Okay, good! I'll find an health potion for you! Hang on!
She ran away blazing fast and came back with a can of soda.
Now drink! NOW! I don't want you to die!
...Die? I drank the whole can in one breath...
Very nice! Your color is back to pink, so your HP are maxed again!
R... Right! We've to spare health potion for the final battle...
Sometimes I'm a little reckless on using items!
I hope you're regenerating a little... You still look a little pale!
Ugh...
Stay there and regenerate a little... I'll ask for help.
She walked back to the park entrance...
Are you okay? Here you are something to drink...
I slowly drank the can of soda the teacher gave to me.
My senses were coming slowly back
Are you okay now? Sit there a little more before going around, understood?
Y... Yeah...
I see the priest revived you... I feel relieved now!
Hey...
Why don't we go drinking something at the cafe?
Let's meet there!
...And then she ran away without waiting for me.

_: ran across the park with her arms opened like an airplane...

set.says: ...Aiming bystanders and making machinegun noises with her mouth.
...After a long and awkward air battle, we reached the ferris wheel...
Aha!
That's the Human Controller MKII!
...What?
It's a spinning device that can show you what the whole humanity is doing in this moment.
You've just to sit down in that cabin and wait to reach the top.
Wait... Do you think I'm lying?
She discovered that I wasn't into gaming very soon...
So she decided to 'fix my problem' listing the top 100 games I have to play to became a man...
Her furious list of names and achronyms was suddenly broken by a loud scream...
That's... The BIG WHEEL!
Did you know that you can control the whole humanity from the top?
...But.
The Japanese Anime and Visual Novels community resticted its usage to a specific group of people...
...In order to gain control over humanity.
Having a ride on the ferris wheel all alone is seen to be suspect and...
Well...
Having a ride together means promise of marriage.
Is... That true?
So... We have a problem.
Look...
I need to go up there but you've...
...To act like my boyfriend.
The JAVN is controlling the entire ferris wheel network.
JAVN?
...And having a ride on that thing automatically means that you're my boyfriend.
What I'm asking you is to act the part.
You'll be fine! I promise you that we'll be back safe and sound!
It's okay with you...
...Putting your arm about my neck?
Oh...
Right! We can't bend over their power!
We have to fight back!
She furiously ran to the ferris wheel operator. What... Did I do?
HEY! YOU! HE ISN'T MY BOYFRIEND AND...
I'M STILL GOING TO RIDE THAT DAMN BIG WHEEL! CAPISCE?
I didn't know what to do... And while I was looking around for help...
...Her hand dragged me inside her cabin.
She violently took my arm and wrapped her neck like a scarf.
I don't know what the right position is but...
...I think you've to give a better grip.
Now, enabling girlfriend mode!
She started chirping and making machine noises with her mouth...
...For an emarassing long time.
Sorry. Switching mode is taking a while!
She stopped 'switching mode' once into the ferris wheel cabin.
She pushed my arm away with the same violence and dropped on her seat.
So... What do we do?
Oh... Sorry... I...
B Plan. We will act like a long time couple instead, okay?
Just... Exchange some words with me about anything.
It will be okay.
She acted like a normal person for a short while. It's a quite strange to say that but...
...She looked even very elegant.
We waited our turn talking about school and professors. Then we quietly entered our cabin.
Perfect!
Our disguise will be perfect!
Huh... Now...
...Do it. We will wait our turn in... That position.
...R... Right.
I wrapped my arm around her neck as gently as I could...
It was like...
...Hugging a log.
She didn't move a muscle until we were into the ferris wheel cabin.
Then, she dropped on her seat and finally started breathing again.
Hey! It's moving!
We looked out of the window the world getting smaller and smaller.

_: was right, after all. It was like having the whole world under your eyes.

set.says: When we reached the top, she said...
Hey...
Do you think that someone like me...
That someone like me will ever succumb to the JAVN and come here with a real boyfriend?
WELL SAID!
Please... Don't scream like that...!
I won't break! And you will help me!
What?!
We will scrap the entire JAVN organization together...
...And make this humanity control devices free for all!
AH! AH! AH! AH!
...As I thought.
Do you think that I'm weak?
Ah! Ah! Ah! I'm joking! I know what you mean!
Unless...
Were you talking about yourself?!
So...
I'll be undercover forever, huh?
So...
I've to destroy the JAVN headquarter and save humanity.
We can't stand the JAVN domination anymore!
Don't you think?!
Damn!
I gave up this time... So you're saying that I'll do the same in the future.
You... You are right.
I've to become stronger... Or I've to take down the whole JAVN organization!
A bunch of worried people was waiting for us at the end of the ride.
Our cabin was swinging back and forth  so suspiciously that they thought that... 'Some kind' of violence was happening.

_: When I apologized to the operator,

set.says: A customer said that she was nervously running to the cafe nearby, so I followed her hoping for the best.
She handed me a portable videogame and asked to beat her high score on a puzzle game.
When I asked how I could both walk and play, she said that was 'part of my training'.
After bumping multiple times on people and things...
...I managed to reach the the teacups attraction.
We meet at last...
...My dear ancient flying saucer.
She suddenly started to show me photos of flying saucers...
...And some of them were clearly taken from old videogames.
She explained to me how alien technology was given to humans at the beginning of time.
Then, something even more strange happened...
Here we are.
This is one of the first forms of human flying saucer.

_: bit her nails for all the way to the teacups attraction.

set.says: She mumbled some word about aliens and... Some kind of cannon that must be built...
Even if her behaviour was already very confusing...
...The scream that followed our arrival at the teacups added a pinch of fear to the mix.
THAT'S AN ALIEN ARTEFACT!
She told me how a perfect teacup spin have to be done...
The right force to apply... The perfect synchronism behind a well done spin...
I tried following her ramblings during our way to the teacups attraction...
But...
Here we are.
Now you're ready for the perfect alien flying saucer liftoff.
Hey, NPC...
Do you know how this flying unit works?
TODO
How... How's possible?!
Are you one of the Fallen Pilots of Humanity?
Why I gave that answer?!
One of your ancestors used one of these flying saucers in the First Alien War...
...And you got your memory back using a french DNA based time machine, right?
How lucky! You'll help me then!
SO... YOU AREN'T AN ALIEN!?
Her scream rumbled across the park for a split second...
Long enough to attract the upset look of the bystanders to us...
Don't worry. We'll figure out how it works examining the control room.
Are you kidding me?
Humans can't use these alien artifact...
Unless...
YOU... ARE YOU AN ALIEN?!
After that scream, my body was pierced by the sharp looks of the bystanders.
Then she whispered...
So you ARE a true alien!? It's marvellous!
Our turn came after a while.
We sat on a teacup facing each other and then it started spinning.
We held on to the black table in the middle and started pushing in the same direction.
The teacup was spinning faster and faster...
HEY!
NOW! HIT THE LIFTOFF BUTTON! GO! GO! GO!
She suddenly whispered...
Don't worry... It's just a simulation!
And then she lifted both arms and shouted...
WE WILL WIN THE WAR, DAMN ALIEEENS!
We ate our usual ration of harsh looks but, this time...
...We both were having genuinely having fun.
I vigorously pressed the center of the table...
ENGAGE!
And... Nothing happened.
...But she lifted both arms and started screaming...
WHOOOOOAAAAAA!
It sounds like she was having a great time, despite my... Horrible acting.
WHAAAT?
SO... AUTOPILOT ENGAGED!
Her voice command did obviously nothing. The cup was spinning like before. But still...
...She lifted both arms and sent an euphorical cry.
WHOOOOOAAAAAA!
She was still having a great time, despite the 'liftoff' failed and my... Insubordination.
I pressed the center of the table...
ENGAGE!
But... Nothing happened.
So... This is a fake, huh.
Her look became sad. She crossed her arms and and became thoughtful.
Was she really thinking a way to make these plastic cups fly?
When I stepped off our teacup I lost my balance for few seconds...

_: was walking backward instead, keeping her eyes on the attraction.

set.says: She probably was trying to understand how to make the teacups fly.
I've mentally noted all the hardware specs of this flying soucer.
We'll surely make it fly in our next flight!
Next... Flight?!
Now, let's go. I've to restore my HP a little.
On the march!
She ran towards a cafe. My head was still spinning a little, so I slowly followed her.

_: sitting at a table, nervously looking drinks on the menu.

set.says: Here you are! Sit down next to me!
I'm checking the stats of these items. I'll find the best for you!
...I... I wanted to choose it by myself!
Do you mind to chat a little with me?
Do... You think I'm too much obsessed by videogames?
Yeah, well. I understand that my passion is too much strong sometimes...
But...
Videogames are just the best thing ever!
Hey! You're way too much sincere!
But you're right! I HAVE to be like this!
Videogames are the true future of entertainment!
Oh!
So... You think that I've to give EVEN more?
Okay! I want to be a TRUE gamer and...
I'll put a pixel art mask for LIFE if it's needed!
AH! AH! AH!
You're probably right but...
...In videogames I can be whoever I want and...
This is my preferred version of me...
Anyway...
Do you think that our choices will truly change the our ending?
Right? What's important is fighting problems every day...
...Reach the staff roll in one piece!
We always get the ending we deserve!
I think that too... Life has a very good game design!
I can't wait to know which choices I'll make...
...And what will happen next!
You're right...
Sometimes I take choices too much seriously...
...But what's important is doing your best and nothing more!
So you are that kind of player, huh?
ACTION! ACTION! ACTION!
...And the only ending is to be victorious!
I'm so jelous!
She remained silent for a little while...
Do you think that... My level... Is high enough for now?
AND YOU'RE RIGHT!
Wh... Why is she shouting like this?!
We aren't never the right level!
Always improve!
XP! XP! XP!
Ugh... Please... They're all looking at us...
Thank you! You're not so bad for being an NPC!
We should exchange some equipment from time to time!
OH! I DID'NT MEANT THAT!
What... Equipment?
You're right...
I've to improve even more...
Thank you for being so sincere...
I'll become the best player ever! You'll see!
You're right but...
I think I've to give even more if you want to win...
I've to do my best, right?
And...
What kind of equipment you think best suits me?
Exactly! That's exactly what's in my inventory on BulletWing XVI!
Hey! Aren't you a spy sent by the evil Blue Clan?!
I... Don't even know what a BulletWing is!
Oh! Right! I didn't think of it!
I must remember to add that on my BulletWing XVI equipment once at home!
It's almost time to go but... Should we desert it and try another ride?
I agree!
Let's finish this drink and do it!
Good idea!
You surely are a good leader...
I've to improve a little more!

_: drank her orange juice silently. She looked surprisingly normal for a little while...

set.says: She stared into space for a moment and then she asked...
NPC...
Tomorrow I'll play a worldwide online match on BulletWing XVI.
What role I should play?
OH!
Good idea! You deserve some extra XP for your answer!
Thank you!
Interesting point of view...
I'll think about that once at home!
I overheard a very important secret yesterday...
Should I have to tell that to someone?
OH!
Good idea! You deserve some more XP for your answer!
Thank you!
Interesting point of view...
I'll think about that once at home!
A friend of mine wants to be a gamer and...
...Asked me to borrow her some of my precious games.
What should I do?
OH!
Good idea! You deserve even more XP for your answer!
Thank you!
Interesting point of view...
I'll think about that once at home!
It was nice to talk with you...
Now... Let's continue our quest!
She left the cafe blazing fast...
...Sadly to that scaringly interwined rollercoaster...
And the evening came in a flash...
It's time to leave, guys!
Remember to gather around the right bus...
...And don't forget to say goodbye to your companion!
I had a lot of fun with you!
I hope to see you soon again!
(Should I give her a gift...?)
(What I can give to her?)
(What I can give to her?)
Oh! That... That's for me?
It's quite unexpected like...
...Like the perfect lootbox!
Thank you very very much!
That's a gift for me?
I shall keep it as a memento of this day!
Thank you!
Today... I had a lot of fun and...
I discovered something more about me... And about you.
So I...
I just want to give this to you...
I hope to see you again tomorrow at school!
A long journay to home is waiting for us and...
I have to charge my batteries a little.
But I hope to see you again at school tomorrow!
We have so many other adventures to live together!
RIIGHT?
...And she disappeared behind the bus doors.

_: ! I think I've seen you before...

set.says: Oh! Right!
You're that guy that have lunch in front of our class every day!
Well... Nice to meet you!

_: ! Probably you don't know me but...

set.says: I see you every day having lunch in front of your classroom!
It's funny that we're talking the first time on a school trip, isn't it?
Shall we go?
There is an attraction I'd like to see first...
She took my hand and dragged me around the theme park for a long while...
Do you want to go somewhere special?
I already know all the attractions of this park... And I love all of them!
Where do you want to go?
Good choice! You've chosen my favourite one!
Hurry! Let's go there!
...I felt my arm coming out after she violently dragged me away into the depths of the park...
...And here we are!
The infamous rollercoaster of this park!
It's said that's the scariest attraction in Japan...
Ugh!
Aren't you excited?
The rollercoaster!
I think that's the most exciting attraction here! Don't you think?
I used to go there with my father, but now he's too scared by this newer version...
Ugh!
You can't wait to test it... I'm right?
I hope you'll enjoy the ride... I think that's the best thing ever!
The funny feeling in your stomach when it sprints upside down is unmissable!
I understand that's a little scary...
...But you'll feel alive when it got to dive!
I... I already feel alive enough!
Don't worry! You've to resist just once!
So, are you ready to fly?
That's the spirit!
If you feel prepared it's less exciting!
You have to feel life... And life is always surprising, isn't it?
Very good!
It's so nice to feel like a bird flying over the void...
...With that feeling of danger and excitement!
I... I don't like the way it sounds!
Oh, sorry!
I... I feel so alive on rollercoasters!
It's like I'm a bird that can go everywhere with a flap!
Just hang on, you'll surely feel he same!
Honestly I just want to survive all this...
Ah ah ah!
You're in the right mood, huh?
Your life will be in danger for 30 minutes!
Aren't you scared?
Ah ah ah! I'm joking, I'm joking!
Ah.. Ah... Ah... That's not so funny...
Hey! It's our turn!
Let's go! Let's go!
I took my place on the rear cars of the rollercoaster, hoping for a softer experience...
That error was so critical I hear my own screams still now...
But, in some way, I managed to survive...
Wow! That has been so intense!
Hey...
Ugh...
Why don't we go for another round... You can hold on me this time!
What do you think?
Oh, you're right!
We don't have to get used to this feeling...
It would be a shame not feeling like this anymore, isn't it?
Ah ah ah!
You're so kind!
Anyway you can't do another ride after a short while...
Thanks gods!
...But I'll consider about another ride in the morning.
You promised, right?
Oh, okay...
I just can't get enough of that feeling of freedom...
One day I'll see the world for real...
And maybe without all that shuffling, right?
...And then, suddenly...
Trust me... Don't do it.
The teacher?!
We still have a long day ahead... Why you've...
...To... Waste...
Excuse me... Unghh...
He ran away to the toilets...
Looks like your teacher saved your life today!
It was so hilarious!
Do you want something to drink?
There is a cafe over there... Follow me!
...And she violently dragged me around again...

_: When I reached the ferris wheel,

set.says: After looking around I found her sitting on a bench, with a flushed face.
This... This is the ferris wheel...
I like... How the world looks so tiny when you're on the top...
It's said that's an attraction for... You know... Couples...
...But I used to go there with my dad.
He always pointed out my grandparents' house once on the top.
The ferris wheel!
She was looking at the top of the ferris wheel, covering her eyes from the sunlight with her hands.
I used to come here with my parents, long ago.
Once on the top, my dad always pointed out my grandparents' house.
But...
When my grandparents died... My father didn't take it well.
So he never brought me again to the ferris wheel.
But now I've a chance to remember those times, right?
When my grandparents died, my father never brought me to the ferris wheel again.
And... Well... Meanwhile I grew up...
...And the ferris wheel became to me an attraction for couples.
Do you want to play a game?
We're going for a ride on the ferris wheel and...
...You have to guess where my grandparents house is.
Do you accept the challenge?
You're right. That's an impossible game!
Okay! I'll give you a tip...
My grandparents' house is yellow and near the lake!
Now it should be easier!
Come on, try!
I wonder how you'll guess...
Do you think that it's a big house? A small one on a river?
Oh!
Don't spoil the fun! We will play once on the top!
Oh, right.
Well... Come with me on the ferry wheel, than. And...
Just point a random house when we're on the top!
I'd like to remember what my dad used to do!
So...
Do you think that you can guess the grandparents house...
...Of someone you've just met?
Okay! It'll be fun!
We lined up and waited for our turn.

_: looked excited, like it was a very special event.

set.says: Our cabin slowly reached the top...
Hey!
You don't have to guess where my grandparents' house is for real.
Do you want me to point out that?
You've surrended!
So I won! Ah! Ah! Ah!
It's that yellow house over there.
I used to live there when I was a child.
But I don't want to bore you with these sad stories!
She watched that yellow house until it disappeared behind the horizon.
It's...
...There!
It's very a large house, isn't it?
My family used to live in the same house long time ago.
When my parents decided to go to the city, my grandparents were left alone.
...But my dad used to go there every evening!
So they weren't left alone for real. I... I think.
Then she quietly followed that house moving along the landscape.
Oh... Okay. As you wish.

_: lost her look into the minuscole landscape rolling outside the window.

set.says: She absently followed the tiny roads crossing together, often stopping nearby a yellow house near the lake.
So you don't even want to try, huh?
It's that big house. Can you see that?
She followed that yellow house with her sight silently for the rest of the ride.
She looked both thoughtful and excited...
When we stepped off the cabin, she showed a nice smile on her face out of the blue.
Do you want something to drink? I'm a little thirsty...
I suggested to go to the cafe nearby. She smiled and followed me with her usual silence.
The parkway to the teacups attraction was very fresh.

_: I sneezed few times and, for every sneeze,

set.says: I tried to say her that one was enough but...
She insisted that health was a serious thing and that using the same handkerchiefs multiple times is unsanitary.
Oh! We're arrived!
The teacups!

_: On the way to the teacup attraction
asked me a suggestion about a new dress for herself.

set.says: I wasn't the right person for a smart answer and...
...My greatest error was trying giving an answer with 'something blue'.
A neverending interrogation followed my sentence, in which she tried to understand 'which shade of blue' I meant.
And just when I was going to faint, the teacups attraction appeared...
Look! The teacups!
She slowly walked around the attraction twice with a little smile on her face.
Hey...
I know that's a little childish but...
Can we have a ride on the teacups, please?
She took my hand and lined up waiting for our turn.
I know that the teacups are a little childish but...
I can't resist!
And you'll be frog prince!
Your frog prince?!
Can I tell you a fairy tale?
You already know that story, right?
My mother used to tell me that fairy tale every evening!
So do you already know what your part in the story is?
You'll be the frog prince in the teacup!
Once upon a time there was a lovely princess...
Her beloved prince was being transformed into a frog by a wicked witch!
Her mother was a fairy and she told her that, in order to transform him back...
...She had to put him into a teacup and drink the tea!
...That's why I love the teacups attraction so much!
Oh!
Okay... Probably that's way too much childish, right?
Just pretend to be a frog, then. Please!
Oh... It's just a story about a princess and a frog...
She had to put him in a teacup in order to turn it back into her prince!
That's why I love the teacups attraction so much!
Our turn came. We jumped into our cup and we started spinning faster and faster...
She smiled and laughed staring off...
I felt like she was feeling a weight in her chest.
(Should I croak?)
She shook her head and glanced at me.
Can we make this think spin faster?
I clung to the table in the center and turned it with all my strenghts.
WOO HOO!
All of a sudden, she became radiant and carefree...
Croak!
Oh!
Pfft! Ah! Ah! Ah!
You've been so sweet!
I felt my face like fire...
So you truly are the frog from the fairy tale!
...But now it's the time to turn back into a prince, right?
CROAK! CROAK!
She started croaking, with the same bittersweet smile.
Then she lifter her arms, squeezed her eyes and remained silent for the rest of the ride.
Croak!
Ah! Ah! Ah!
You are too human to be my frog prince!
But I appreciate that so much! Thanks!
After our ride she happily jumped out of our teacup.
She stared a cloud in the sky for a little.
Hey... Are you thirsty?
There is a nice cafe over there...
Follow me!
The cafe was almost deserted, probably because of the late time.
Uh!
This menu is huge!
I think that it will take long to decide...
Can you help me?
I love chocolate a lot...
...But I don't want to... Gain weight...
So...
Do you think I can take this Chocapocalypse Milkshake?
An healthy body is an healthy mind!
That's what my mother always says...
I'm glad that you share the same opinion...
I'll take something else, then!
Yes!
That was the answer I wanted!
Well... I don't want to gain weight but...
...If you say that I have to take it, I don't want you to be disappointed!
...Have?!
WRONG ANSWER!
Oh, excuse me!
I... Just wanted to taste it...
Look at the photo on the menu... It's pretty huge!
Anyway... You've probably saved me hours of workout, so...
Thank you!
We are young... We've to enjoy life, isn't it?
But...
I'll consider the option, if you insist...
What do you think about...
...This cup of liquorice tea? It looks delicious!
...Right?
Tea is quite boring... I'd like to drink something more theme park styled!
Like...
...This Extralarge cup of strawberry ice cream!
It looks great, isn't it?
You got it!
I love drinking tea very much.
I never tasted liquorice tea, so I wanted to try it so much!
I'll surely take it! Thanks for your advice!
Do you think that's a little boring?
I should order something more... Young...
Like... This peach iced tea!
...Right?
(Isn't that... Still tea?)
Nice choice!
It's always nice to see a lady sipping tea, huh?
I'm joking! Thank you for your suggestion!
Or... Do you prefer to go first?
Oh! Good!
So, I'll take a creme caramel and...
...These pink macaroons!
I suggest you a nice cup of lemon tea!
I know that's boring but it's super healthy and...
...You'll be ready for a rollercoaster ride later!
(No... The rollercoaster no... Please!)
Do you want to put some more pressure on?
Okay!
Huh... I'd like...
Huh...
Just a small cup of ice cream!
I'll take some time and decide something better later!
Okay, I'll wait for you.
Oh! Do you need some help on deciding?
I suggest you the giant chocolate cup and orange!
That's my father favourite drink here, so I hope you'll like it too!
We ordered our drinks. The waiter said that he would come back in minutes.
Hey... I know we've just met but...
I need a suggestion from... Well...
Someone who don't know me...
Do you think I should be...
...More... Appealing?
Thank you!
You are so good on suggesting!
I hope you'll help me again with my choices!
Oh, sorry!
I... I just got distracted for a moment!
Thank you for your suggestion!
At first glance, what kind of girl do you think I'm? Be honest, okay?
Are you truly sincere?
Was that your true first impression?
Well, thank you! I think you're right, in some way!
Thank you!
I usually give this impression to others but...
I'm working on it!
The drinks we ordered came after a while. We thanked the waiter, who left in a hurry.
Can you pass me the...
...And our fingers unintentionally touched.
Oh!
(What can I do?)
Oh... Excuse...
Excuse me... I didn't meant...
Eh!
Oh! Sorry!
I really can't wait to taste this!
...She accidentally spilled by milkshake over me.
Oh! Wh... What?! Oh! Sorry! Sorry! Sorry!
(What can I do?)
Can I help you on cleaning up...
Oh! I mean... The table! Not...
...Not the clothes...
Ah ah ah! I'm surely too clumsy! Sorry!
Then I tried cleaning up myself the best I could.
I'm going to call someone!
She ran into the cafe, with flushed face.
She came back with the waiter, some handkerchiefs and a bottle of water.
The waiter helped me on cleaning my dresses up the best he could.
I'm sorry... I'm so... Clumsy...
...Bill? Let's split it right now!
(What now?)
Oh!
Okay!
Let's enjoy our drink now!
Oh!
Okay...
Now it's drinking time!
We quietly drank for few minutes...

_: looked distractedly passers by, alternating it with few elusive looks to me.

set.says: I'm done! Thank you for waiting for me!
Shall we go?
And the evening came in a flash...
It's time to leave, guys!
Remember to gather around the right bus...
...And don't forget to say goodbye to your companion!
I had a lot of fun with you!
I hope to see you soon again!
(Should I give her a gift...?)
(What I can give to her?)
(What I can give to her?)
Oh, it's for me?
It's quite... Original! Why are you're giving it to me?
I'm not saying I don't like it!
It's the opposite, actually! I'll surely remember this day!
Thanks!
Thank you!
I... Don't have anything for you but...
I hope you'll remember this day together anyway!
Sorry!
Thank you for spending this day with me...
I had a lot of fun, discovered more about me...
...And about you!
So I...
I just want to give this to you...
Can't wait to see you at school tomorrow!
Goodbye!
What an intense day, wasn't that?
Thank you for spending it with me! I had a lot of fun with you!
But now you can't simply disappear!
We've to be friends! No turning back, okay?
See you tomorrow, okay?
...And she disappeared behind the bus doors.
I heard a rumbling sound from the bus parking and then...
Sorry for the late!
The bus parking is so large that I couldn't resist!
I had to do 50 laps!
...Fifty?!
Let's get this straight...
We've to go fast today, okay?
Let's take advantage of the park size and train a little!
But... Wasn't that a school trip?
Well. I've seen the map and found the farthest attraction.
I'll race you to there! Ready?
Three...
Hey... A race?
Two...
Wait! Wait! Why we can't go there together?!
One...
At least tell me where the destination is!
Go!
...And she disappeared in a flash.
It took a good fifteen minutes to find a map and try to guess this 'race' destination...
Then I sighed and wandered out down to the destination.
I'll let you choose our first stage.
Go on! I'm ready for everything!
...Is this... A race?!
(Where are we going to go first?)
Ready... Set... Go!
(Wh... What?)
She disappeared so fast I didn't get to watch her.
I sighed and walked to our rendezvous point alone.
I found her petrified in front of the rollercoaster.
This rollercoaster... Is so huge!
Look at the tracks! It's larger than a stadium!
Is... This what makes a rollercoaster exciting?
I found her petrified in front of the rollercoaster.
Why?
Why there are carts running over the rails?
Why I can't run over the rails with my OWN FEETS?
She... Doesn't know how rollercoasters works for real?!
Hey you!
Don't even think to have a run on this thing today!
We are going to...
...Run around this rollercoaster for 100 times!
(...That's not this rollercoaster purpose! This isn't the purpose of ANY rollercoaster!)
So you better get ready to run again!
I wonder how's having a ride on these things.
I've never been there.
But...
We aren't here to sit down on a... Rocket!
Is... This some sort of saying?
We are here for running!
So, take a deep breath and follow me!
...Ready?
Oh!
Am I excessive?
Sorry. You don't look like a sportsman...
Hey...
Can you wait me here for a little while?
This rollercoaster is the perfect training ground for running and dodging...
...And that's too challenging to resist!
I'll be right back!
She ran away. I sayed still for few seconds, trying to understand what was happening.
Then I sat down on a bench and looked the others having fun...
As promised, she finally stopped by after few laps.
That's the spirit of a champion!
Hey!
I tried to follow her for half an hour but all I got was being dubbed countless times...
At last I managed to make three rounds before collapsing over a bench.
Then she finally stopped by with a worried face.
You're missing an opportunity for becoming a true man!
Oh! Am I... Doing that again?
So... Sorry...
She ran away. Was she crying?
I was so confused I stayed still in the crowd for a long while.
Had I done something wrong?
I sat down on a bench, thinking and thinking again.
When she came back, she unexpectedly showed me her best smiling face.
Oh! Is this...
A CHALLENGE?
No! I'm just...
May the best man win!
I just wanted to... Have fun...
I accepted my fate and dragged myself around the rollercoaster for half an hour.
Eventually I found myself collapsed on a bench.

_: stopped by with a satisfied grin printed on her face.

set.says: Thank you for the run!
Well... I know that we're here for having fun but...
...Running is my way of having fun.
...But probably that's not everybody's way, so...
...Do you want to have a rollercoaster ride now?
Well, okay!
I was a little concerned about your mood and...
Well... You reassured me! Thank you!
Nice! Let's go!
We lined up for a rollercoaster ride for minutes.
Seeing her impatience was truly painful.
But my pain came instead from the rollercoaster itself.
I never experienced fear so intensely before. On curves I even felt my soul leaving the body for fractions of second.
And finally...
It was so great!
I want to become this fast one day!
...And I'll pick you up, so you'll have a rollercoaster ride whenever you want!
I felt a disturbing mix of embarrassment and fear. I tried to smile and nod the best I could.
Oh.
Are you angry?
I didn't want to force you...
Well! I'll perk up later, you bet!
As you wish, then!
Let's go!
She left me behind again.
I've seen her in the same place after few minutes.
I couldn't remember what happened in the meantime.
I just had some flashes about me screaming on a rollercoaster cart lying in the arms of death itself...
She was smiling to me, instead...
That was so amazing!
We must do that again later, right?
(No, please. No...)
I'm a little thirsty. Why don't we go to that cafe?
I promise I won't force you on energy drinks!
And she ran away. Again.
She slowed down her furious run little by little, while she was appaching the giant ferry wheel.
Look! This is... The ferry wheel!
She looked radiant for some reason...
It reminds me of fairy tales!
We have to try that! Hurry! Let's go!
Wooohooo!

_: was all charged up in front of the ferry wheel.

set.says: Look! We're arrived here just when they are starting the wheel up!
Can't wait to see when it will go faster!
(I... Don't think it will go any faster...)
Run! I want to be there when the wheel will speed up!
We lined up and waited for our turn.
With a little puzzled look, she said...
Have you ever been on a ferris wheel?
I've ever wanted to go there. The view up there should be so...
...Helpful! I'm sure you can see alleys you can't see on maps!
I brought a lot of paper with me! I'll plan my next run from up there!
And...
I can't wait to see it spinning faster and faster!
Hey! It's our turn!

_: jumped on our cabin filled with excitement and the ferris wheel started moving.

set.says: Her excitement broke once we saw the long line in front of the ferris wheel.
Oh, damn.
It's going to take too much before it's our turn...
I want to have my ride when it's gaining speed!
Gaining speed?!
Hurry! We've to find a way for skipping the line!
Seeing her finding creative ways for surpassing was both funny and awkward...
But undoubtly her plan worked. Our turn came very quickly.
She looked around the cabin, looking for something.
I thought there was some kind of pedals you can push...
...That makes the cabin spin faster.
(What kind of ferris wheel does she know?!)
She watched the landscape for a while...
Hey... Do you think that it would be better if these cabins spin faster?
He took one look outside the cabin window.
Her glaring look softened up, blossoming in a little smile.
Hey...
I think that you're right.
Sometimes going slow... Is better than running fast. Isn't it?
She looked a little embarassed for some reason.
She went back to the cabin window, deep in thought.
Right?
I can't see the point of going so slow...
...Especially if we're here just to reach the top!
After following the landscape with impatience, her look became softer.
But... Seeing everything getting smaller and smaller is so relaxing!
Huh? Do you think that's okay?
But... Going on the top will take forever!
She crossed her arms and remained silent.
Then she absentmindedly watched outside the window...
Oh!
It's... Beautiful! Look!
She started pointing out to me all the places she could recognize...
Yeah!
She glared at the cabin window with a pouty face.
Out of that little window, the world was swinging and getting smaller and smaller.
A little smile appeared on her face.
Hey! It isn't so bad like this anyway.
Slowing down for a little...
She whispered something, before going back to the cabin window.
We silently completed our ride.
After leaving the cabin, we stood back and walked a little in the very same silence.
What was she thinking?
Hey...
I'm sorry I'm a little silent today...
Do you want to race a bit?
There is a cafe nearby! The winner will offer the drinks!
Why the winner... Have to pay?
Ready?
Oh, come on!
Okay. I won't force you.
Can you wait me there, then? I have to go somewhere...
I won't be too long!
And she disappeared, without giving any explanation.
So you're so sure to lose, huh?
Well! At least you'll get a free drink...
...As a thank you for our ferris wheel ride!
Let's go!
She disappeared in the theme park gardens...
I tried to follow her as fast as I could but I started wheezing after few meters... And then I got lost.
So are you refusing a free drink from a nice girl, huh?
That's... Not what I...
You don't like me?
If you want forgiveness, you have to beat me in a race!
Are you ready?
Let's go!
Why I refused the race and still had to run?
I gave my best, but after few minutes I was just tired and... Lost.
Oh...
I was wrong to speak...
Obviously the loser have to pay!
I realized very soon that my answer was bold...
Welp! What's done is done! Ready to run?
See you there!
I had no hope of winning, but I tried following her as much as I could.
I found myself wandering around the park and trying to figure out what just happened.
I decided to clear my head and slowly walked alone to the cafe...
When I finally reached the teacups I was barely breathing...

_: smiled and handed over her water bottle.

set.says: I beckoned her that I was okay.
Here we are. The teacups!
I found her still running around the teacups attractions.
When she saw me, she gave a pat on my back and smiled.
You're late!
But, hey... We're at the teacups!
That's an attraction I can't understand...
If you want to go fast and in circle... Why don't you run?
Wow! There are a lot of people in here!
It's nice to go round faster and faster...
Even if I think that running is way better!
Huh...
She looked at me with an inquisitive look...
Running is better than these teacups, right?
So you are a sedentary advocate!
Wh... What's that?
Okay! Try to convince me!
Right?
Oh. Don't worry! I'm not going to ask you to run again.
Instead...
Oh. Whatever.
You may be right...
So prove me that you're right!
Do you agree?
Yeah... I understand that these are two different experiences...
...But running with your own feets is unparalleled!
That said...
She dragged me on one of that teacups, forced me to sit down and...
Show me how this thing works!
I clung to the small table on the center of the cup and...
(Should I have to push it vigorously?)
I gently pushed the table...
Wh... What? THAT'S... IT?
Her shout was so loud that it scared the passenger of the teapot nearby.
PUSH IT HARDER!
My face exploded of embarrassment...
I think I blacked out briefly then...
All I remember then is me, sitting on a bench and...
I pushed the table with all my heart...
HEY! IT'S... TOO FAST!
The world was moving around wildly...
WOOHOO!
IT'S LIKE FLYING!
She screamed for a the whole ride...
...And I kept my eyes and mouth shut in order to limit my dizziness.
I gently pushed the table...
Well...
It's not that bad, you know?
The speed is just right and...
She noticed that I had my eyes on her for the whole time...
...But mostly because of my fear of speed.
I tried to look away but every time I did thet I felt a punch in the guts...
This awkward torture lasted for a long long time...
I pushed the table with all my heart...
Is this all that you can make?
Then she pushed the table too...
And then...
Wh... What's happening at the teacups?
Is that... A tornado? I can't see who's on board!
I remember seeing the teacher face for a split second...
...And the next thing I remember is me sitting on a bench with a pale face.
It was fun, after all!
...But sitting down for so long made me wanna a little run...
I was barely breathing... It couldn't be true...
Are you ready?
To the cafe, then!
And she disappeared again.
When I arrived to the cafe, she wasn't there.
I sat down and started browsing the menu, looking for her from time to time.
Then, she arrived.
Hi! Sorry for the late!
I was sweating a little too much, so I went back to the bus and changed my clothes.
(...She goes around with spare clothes?)
Do you have already decided something for me?
Oh...
You sensed that I'm a little picky with drinks, huh?
...Okay!
I'll take this peach iced tea.
I suggested her a mint flavoured iced tea...
Wow! It looks tasty and light!
Thank you! I'll take that one!
Oh!
I'll decide then...
Uh...
I'm fast on running... But surely not on choosing...
She silently fetched the menu multiple times.
Uh...
Do you think that I can take this cup of liquorice tea?
Well... I'll take the risk!
Why I suggested her that... Gigachocolate Cup 2000K?
Do you want to kill me?!
Damn!
Sorry... I promised you to be a little more normal...
I'll take it if you'll take the same, okay?
So... Should I have take a cup of tea?
Huh!
Do you think I should take something else...
...Because we are having fun on a school trip?
Uhm.
I think that makes sense!
I'll just take a glass of water, than!
(Isn't that... Even worse?!)
Good!
Tea is both light, tasty and...
It's kinda elegant too. And that's a good thing...
Since some friends of mine says that I'm a little too much... Masculine.
Huh!
Do you think that I should take something else...
...Because we are having fun on a school trip?
Uhm.
I think that makes sense!
I'll have a glass of water, than!
(Isn't that... Even worse?!)
Good!
I wish there was something as healthy as tea but...
Well... That's a little more interesting.
Girls drinking tea are quite boring, isn't it?
At least that's what my big brother says!
I have a spare track suit for you too!
Don't worry... It's unisex! So, what do you think?
Oh!
I see...
You are THAT kind of male, huh?
W... What kind of male?
Do you think that sweating is so manly and sexy, huh?
W...What?!
Ah! Ah! Ah! Don't worry! I'm joking!
Let me know if you change your mind, okay?
And... You don't smell at all!
Very good!
I always take two spare track suits with me! I like running with friends but...
...I also like running in unusual places, so I've to be ready for anything!
Don't worry, it's just washed!
My family runs a laundry in town, so my track suites are always fresh and clean!
Being a runner and having clean clothes for free it's just too good to be true!
Okay!
I'll give my track suit to you at the bus parking.
...But remember to give it back to me tomorrow!
Don't worry about cleaning it up!
We run a laundry in town, so I'll do it for you, okay?
The cafe was crowded and the waiter took a long while before serving our table...
Hey...
I think that's clear that I like running so much!
I'll enter a competition next week and I'm a bit anxious.
I trained a lot so I should be okay, but...
Is there something I can do for feeling a little better?
Good idea! I didn't think about that!
You are pretty good at giving competition tips...
Are you one of these... Top of the class guys?
Always doing exams and giving your best?
Yeah... I tried with that too but it's no use...
Anyway...
We're here to have fun, so... We don't have to talk about that boring stuff, right?
I know I look all fitness and so on but...
I'm neither the top of my class at gymnastics...
What do you think about me?
answers: I like the way you look

set.says: Oh! Really?
Th... Thank you!
You're very nice and...
No one ever told me that!
Thank you! I'm always trying to do my best!
...And one day I'll beat all my schoolmates... And the whole world!
Right?

_: fetched the menu a little more and gave her order. I did the the same.

set.says: The waiter apologised for the late and left in a hurry.
Huh...
I don't have many male friends and...
...Most of them are just training mates.
I'd like to ask you something, since you're... A school mate instead.
How would you describe me... As... Girl?
For real?
Thank you!
I hope you'll say that around... I'm not very popular in our school since...
...A lot of people are scared by my obsession with running!
Ah! Ah! Ah!
For real?
Thank you!
Honestly... Do you think that I'm scary?
Oh!
That what I wanted to hear!
I work hard every day to be what I want to be...
...And others opinions won't stop me!
Really?
Well... At least you were honest.
Thank you!
I looked in my wallet and what I've found left a monstrously shocked face on me...
The absolute void. I forgot to take the money before leaving home... So what now?
Are you okay? Are you out of money?
Don't worry! I'll pay it for you this time!
Don't worry!
Well!
You'll give me the money back tomorrow, right?
O... Okay...
Ah! Look at your face! You're so funny!
Don't worry! You just owe me something nice, okay?
No problem, don't mention it!
Sometimes I run for so much long that when I stop I no longer know where I am...
So I always bring with me enough money for passing the night in an hotel!
(S... Seriously?)
The waiter went back with our drinks. What happened next was in a matter in of seconds...
Then she drank her drink in one breath and...
Welp... Shall we go?
...She ran away.
I smiled to the waiter, left my drink on the table and started running after her as fast as I could...
And the evening came in a flash...
It's time to leave, guys!
Remember to gather around the right bus...
...And don't forget to say goodbye to your companion!
I had a lot of fun with you!
I hope to see you soon again!
(Should I give her a gift...?)
(What I can give to her?)
(What I can give to her?)
Is that... For me?
Thank you! I'm not used to gifts and...
I honestly don't know what to say!
I'll surely remember this for long time!
Thank you! I always bring one of these with me as a lucky charm, so...
I'll never be without that, thanks to you!
Hey... Can I tell you a secret?
Come a little closer!
I'm not... Very good at these things but...
Today I had a lot of fun and I think...
I think that... I like you.
So... Make sure to come to see me tomorrow at school, okay?
I'm used to running but...
Today has been a pretty intense day, isn't it?
I can't wait to go at my seat and sleep a lot!
Thank you for this nice day!
I hope to see you again tomorrow at school!
Bye!
...And she disappeared behind the bus doors.
